title: Luxury House for Sale in Horton Place, Colombo 7
details:
Luxury House in Horton Place in Colombo 7
Highly Residential area with a wide main road front
16 Perches of prime wide front land
Very Prestigious address to own a house in Colombo 7
4000 sqft large house with 6 bed Rooms and 6 bath Rooms
New house and well maintained house by the owner
Higher value appreciation for the property and very rare opportunity buy a house in Colombo 7
